subject: Embezzlement
lead_paragraph: Mark Cuban, the owner of the Dallas Mavericks, has been accused of wrongfully diverting millions of dollars from the Mavericks’ home arena to help make up for cash shortfalls incurred by the team.
snippet: Mark Cuban, the owner of the Dallas Mavericks, has been accused of wrongfully diverting millions of dollars from the Mavericks’ home arena to help make up for cash shortfalls incurred by the team.
